searchSql.baseSql: select us.id userId,us.REAL_NAME name,us.USERNAME userName,us.MOBILE mobile,us.avatar avatarUrl,j.JOB_NAME job,o.ORG_NAME org ,tg.CASE_CODE from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR tg left join sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE mort on mort.CASE_CODE=tg.CASE_CODE inner join sctrans.t_yucui_org_hierarchy ht on tg.ORG_ID=ht.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_USER us on (us.id=ht.MANAGER_ID or ht.DISTRICT_ID=us.id or tg.PROCESSOR_ID=us.ID or mort.LOANER_ID=us.ID) and us.IS_DELETED='0' and us.AVAILABLE='1' left join sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB uoj on uoj.USER_ID=us.ID and uoj.ISMAIN = 1 and uoj.IS_DELETED=0 left join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=uoj.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_JOB j on j.id=uoj.JOB_ID where tg.CASE_CODE=#caseCode#

select us.id userId,us.REAL_NAME name,us.USERNAME userName,us.MOBILE mobile,us.avatar avatarUrl,j.JOB_NAME job,o.ORG_NAME org from sctrans.SYS_USER us left join sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB uoj on uoj.USER_ID=us.ID and uoj.ISMAIN=1 and uoj.IS_DELETED='0' left join sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB uoj1 on uoj.USER_ID=us.ID and uoj1.USER_ID=us.id and uoj1.ISMAIN=1 and uoj1.IS_DELETED='0' left join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=uoj.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_JOB j on j.id=uoj.JOB_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG o1 on o1.id=uoj1.ORG_ID where (us.REAL_NAME like #q_text# + '%' or o1.ORG_NAME like #q_text# + '%') and us.IS_DELETED='0' and us.AVAILABLE='1'
